tool_description: Generate PDF documents with embedded images and text.
name: Book AI API
title: Book AI API

api_list.name: PDF Generation
api_list.description: Generate PDF page by specifying a propmt and a style
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://book-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com/GeneratePdf/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://book-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com/GeneratePdf/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
